item.title: Tensorflow GPU on Nvidia 1660 Ti
item.description: Although my GPU is not listed here, I can confirm that 1660 Ti works. The machine learning training is now significantly faster than using CPU. ➜ imagerec git:(updated-deps) ✗ nvidia-smi Tue May 5 15:00:40 2020 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | NVIDIA-SMI 440.33.01 Driver Version: 440.33.01 CUDA Version: 10.2 | |-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+ | GPU Name Persistence-M| Bus-Id Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC | | Fan Temp Perf Pwr:Usage/Cap| Memory-Usage | GPU-Util Compute M. | |===============================+======================+======================| | 0 GeForce GTX 166.
